content: राधा {@--1@} Prosperity, success. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a celebrated Gopī or cowherdess loved by Kṛṣṇa (whose amours have been immortalized by Jayadeva in his Gītagovinda); तदिमं राधे गृहं प्रापय <ls>Gīt. 1.</ls> {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of the wife of Adhiratha and foster-mother of Karṇa. {@--4@} The lunar mansion called विशाखा. {@--5@} Lightning. {@--6@} An attitude in shooting. {@--7@} Emblic Myrobalan. {@--8@} The full-moon day in the month of Vaiśākha.
